title: At the Airport
description: Listen to a conversation at an airport check-in counter.

audio.text: Staff: Good morning! Where are you flying to today? [PAUSE] Customer: Good morning. I'm flying to Tokyo. Here's my passport and booking confirmation. [PAUSE] Staff: Thank you. Do you have any luggage to check in? [PAUSE] Customer: Yes, I have one suitcase. [PAUSE] Staff: Okay. Your suitcase is 22 kilograms. That's within the limit. Would you like a window seat or an aisle seat? [PAUSE] Customer: A window seat, please. I like looking at the clouds. [PAUSE] Staff: Of course. Here's your boarding pass. Your flight departs from gate 15 at 2:30 PM. Boarding starts at 2:00 PM. [PAUSE] Customer: Thank you. Is there any delay today? [PAUSE] Staff: No, all flights are on time today. Have a pleasant journey!
